meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

vlive.korean: 진짜 눌러버린다? I'm going to press you. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : First UNLOCK in Chicago❤
시간이 없어요 - 해버린다 해버린다! There's no time! - We're doing it, we're doing it! 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 유부초밥 🦄♥️
vlive.english: There's no time! - We're doing it, we're doing it!

vlive.korean: 죽여버린다. I'll kill you. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 편의점 재료만으로 양식을? 최현석 청소 요정으로 이직하다! <초이가이버> 15회
그... - 죽여버린다!!!! Well... - I'll kill you! 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 최현석, 장인어른 호칭에 예대 출신 의뢰인에게 역대급 분노 <초이가이버> 16회
성적 떨어지면 이거 다 갖다 버린다 어? If you get bad grades, I'm throwing all these out. Okay? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 소름주의) 엄마한테 들켜버렸다;; [인울]- 티저
vlive.english: If you get bad grades, I'm throwing all these out. Okay?

examples.korean: Long flights throw my sleeping pattern out of kilter for days. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 장시간 비행기 여행을 하면 며칠 동안 수면 주기가 깨져 버린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Long flights throw my sleeping pattern out of kilter for days. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I never forget a face. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 사람들 얼굴은 절대 안 잊어버린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I never forget a face. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The nutrient is quickly leached away. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 영양분은 빠르게 침출되어 버린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The nutrient is quickly leached away. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She has a very short memory 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 기억력이 짧다[금방 잘 잊어버린다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has a very short memory Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When I hear the word ‘football’ I switch off. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 ‘축구’라는 말을 들으면 신경을 꺼 버린다. (관심이 없다는 뜻) Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When I hear the word ‘football’ I switch off. Add to Wordbook
